::Prowl::

Prowl looks into Iron Raptor's eyes as she turns his head toward her, 
about to answer her first sentence when she spoke up again. He sighs, 
making no move to respond to her kiss, but leaning back and looking 
into her eyes.

"I'm sorry," he says, holding back from calling her 'love'. He wasn't 
sure if she still wanted him to call her that. He could feel emotions 
coming from her, but he couldn't make them out.

"I .. I don't know," he replies to her words after she kissed him. He 
was still mad at himself, and probably would be for the rest of his 
life. Maybe it would have been better if Obitertron had killed him 
back at the last battle, instead of smashing him into near death, 
maybe it would be better for Iron Raptor if Prowl was killed in the 
next battle...

But no, Prowl knew that if either one of them died now, the other 
would as well, it was part of his deal with the Matrix.

"I'll leave if you wish," he says, not knowing why the words came out 
of his mouth, "You'd be better off with someone else."

'Like Dinobot', he finished to himself, wishing that he had not 
thought that as he realizes how much better the reptile could have 
done this procedure.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
